Summary._: [E] trains are running with delays in both directions because of switch problems at Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer.

Description._: [E] trains are running with delays in both directions because of switch problems at Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer.

LongDescription:
Some northbound [E] trains are stopping along the [F] line from Kew Gardens-Union Tpke to Jamaica-179 St because of switch problems at Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer.
Expect delays on [E] and [F] train service.
Our crews are on scene making repairs and we hope to resume regular service soon. We will keep you posted.
